query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative approach to music videos and performance art redefine the entertainment industry and influence future generations of artists?

query_2.text: How did Whitney Houston's unique vocal style and emotional delivery influence the evolution of pop and R&B music in the 1980s and 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's constant reinvention of his musical persona influence the evolution of pop culture and the acceptance of gender fluidity in the music industry?

query_4.text: How did Freddie Mercury's unique blend of theatricality and vocal prowess influence the evolution of rock music and the performance styles of future artists?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's evolution as an artist and public figure influenced the way her music addresses themes of mental health and personal resilience?

query_6.text: How did Bob Marley's experiences with social injustice and personal struggles influence the themes of love and resilience in his music?
